model
Class CardDeck

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      model.CardDeck
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoorDeck, TreasureDeck
public class CardDeck
extends java.util.Observable

Class that represents the a card deck with a draw pile and a discard pile.

Field Summary

          Stack of cards that make up the discard pile.

shuffle

protected void shuffle()
Randomly sorts all the cards in the draw pile.

drawCard

public Card drawCard()
              throws PlayImmediatelyException,
                     NoCardsLeftException,
                     EndGameException
Returns the top card from the draw pile stack of cards.

Returns:
the top card from the draw pile
Throws:
PlayImmediatelyException - occurs when the drawn card must be played immediately
NoCardsLeftException - occurs when there are no cards left to draw
EndGameException - occurs when the drawn card causes someone to win and ends the game

discard

public void discard(Card card)
Puts the given card on the top of the discard pile.

Parameters:
card - the card to be discarded

takeDiscard

public Card takeDiscard()
                 throws PlayImmediatelyException,
                        EndGameException
Removes and returns the top card from the discard pile.

Returns:
the top card of the discard pile
Throws:
PlayImmediatelyException - occurs when the taken card must be played immediately
EndGameException - occurs when the drawn card causes someone to win and ends the game

getDiscardPile

public java.util.Stack<Card> getDiscardPile()
Return the discard pile stack of cards.

Returns:
the discard pile

containsCard

public boolean containsCard(Card card)
Returns whether or not the deck (draw pile and discard pile combined) contains the given card.

Parameters:
card - the card to check for
Returns:
true if the card if found in the deck (draw/discard piles); false otherwise

removeCard

public boolean removeCard(Card card)
Removes the card from the deck (draw pile and discard pile combined).

Parameters:
card - the card to remove
Returns:
true if the card was found in the deck (draw/discard piles); false otherwise
